metadata.title: CVE-2017-9527 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The mark_context_stack function in gc.c in mruby through 1.2.0 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based use-after-free andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted.rb file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9527` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mruby - 1.4.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mruby package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0-1').
